review_data.title: Sosolala
review_data.content: Total überbewertet. Macht auf edler Italiener, aber die Qualität bleibt unter den Erwartungen. Sehr kleine Portionen für den Preis.

review_data.title: Five star Italian restaurant
review_data.content: Located in a quiet area, in this restaurant, you will not find any pizzas on the menu but you will not miss them: the primi and secondi piatti are prepared with love and very good. As amuse-bouche we got a delicious mini soup.

review_data.title: Ristorante strepitoso
review_data.content: Luogo accogliente e cibo di prima qualità. Staff qualificato, educato e gentile. Ideale per qualsiasi occasione. Ci tornerò sicuramente.

review_data.title: Nett, aber teuer

review_data.title: Ottimo!

review_data.title: Authentic Italian
review_data.content: Very nice little Italian restaurant with friendly staff, great Italian cuisine. Located in an inner City neighbourhood. I sat outside in the street front area for lunch because it was a nice day but it is also a nice cosy indoor restaurant as well.
